Test Name: MAYOCOMPLETE Endometrial Carcinoma Panel, Next-Generation Sequencing
Specimen Type: Formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tumor tissue or fresh frozen tumor tissue
Purpose: Detection of genetic mutations in endometrial carcinoma tumor samples using NGS technology.
Container: FFPE tissue block or frozen tissue cryovial
Equipment: Microtome, NanoDrop or Qubit fluorometer, PCR thermocycler, Ion Torrent or Illumina MiSeq sequencer, bioinformatics workstation
